# Javelin of Lightning
## Overview
**Aura** faint evocation; **CL** 5th

**Slot** none

**Price** 1,500 gp

**Weight** 2 lbs.

**Description**

This javelin becomes a 5d6 *[[Lightning Bolt (Spell)|lightning bolt]]* when thrown (Reflex DC 14 half ). It is consumed in the attack.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Lightning Bolt (Spell)|lightning bolt]]*

**Cost** 750 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 473
